## isStatusCodeRetriable() function

isStatusCodeRetriable checks whether the supplied HTTP status code is retriable.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isStatusCodeRetriable(statusCode: number): boolean;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  statusCode | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
